title: Lovely modern industrial font! Please Help!
content:
Can anyone identify this font please? really like the simplicity and rounded edges.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140901231203im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pearsons_6394.font.jpg)
author: sijones75

comments.content:
It must be **[Vinyl](http://web.archive.org/web/20140901231203/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/vinyl/)** by Brad Demarea [T26, 1998]  
and the serif text looks like **[Klinic Slab (Bold Italic)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140901231203/http:/www.losttype.com/font/?name=klinic)** by Joe Prince [2013]
